text.headline: History of Nepal
text.text: Houston's voice caught the imagination of the world propelling her to superstardom at an early age becoming one of the most awarded performers of our time. This is a look into the amazing heights she achieved and her personal struggles with substance abuse and a tumultuous marriage.

text.headline: Rise of East India Company
text.text: British East India Company gains control of Bengal

text.headline: Start of Unified Kingdom
text.text: Gorkha ruler Prithvi Narayan Shah conquers Kathmandu and lays foundations for unified kingdom

text.headline: Chaudandi and Majh Kirant states
text.text: Conquest of Chaudandi and Majh Kirant states

text.headline: Nepal Tibet War
text.text: Nepalese expansion halted by defeat at hands of Chinese in Tibet
